about_the_game:
The Adventures of Sargon is story-focused DLC, where you'll play as one of the most famous rulers of ancient Mesopotamia, Sargon II, and relive all of his important campaigns and achievements. Suppress dangerous rebellions, conquer the surrounding empires and ultimately restore the glory of the Assyrian Empire.

Fully voice acted dialogs system

New, fully voice acted dialogs system will take you through the life and work of Sargon II. Meet many historical figures and experience the history of ancient Mesopotamia like never before.

New campaign

Completely new campaign with over a dozen new missions focus on Mesopotamia during the Sargon II reign.

Warfare

Use your mighty armies to conquer the surrounding territory. But beware, a strong army needs to be supported by a strong economy. And your enemies will try to take advantage of any missteps and take back what was theirs.



  • Six different unit types, each with specific role in the army and battle.
  • With each battle, units gain experience and increase their strength.
  • Supply units with different goods to reach their full potencial.
